javadoc: Command to add a memory block.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: blockType
params.comment:
type of block to add: MemoryBlockType.DEFAULT, 
 MemoryBlockType.OVERLAY, or MemoryBlockType.BIT_MAPPED or MemoryBlockType.BYTE_MAPPED

params.name: baseAddr
params.comment:
base address for the source address if the block type
 is TYPE_BIT_MAPPED or TYPE_BYTE_MAPPED; otherwise, null

name: AddMemoryBlockCmd
comment: Command to add a memory block.
